thread.title: Female Post Office worker assaulted during terrifying armed raid, manhunt underway
thread.title_full: Female Post Office worker assaulted during terrifying armed raid, manhunt underway

title: Female Post Office worker assaulted during terrifying armed raid, manhunt underway
text:
A female Post Office worker was assaulted during a terrifying armed raid this afternoon. Share Female Post Office worker assaulted during terrifying armed raid, manhunt underway Independent.ie A female Post Office worker was assaulted during a terrifying armed raid this afternoon. http://www.independent.ie/irish-news/news/female-post-office-worker-assaulted-during-terrifying-armed-raid-manhunt-underway-35366665.html Comments 
Gardaí are investigating the robbery that occurred at a post office in Kilanerin, Gorey, County Wexford shortly after midday. 
Three men, believed to be armed with a firearm, sledge hammer and a pickaxe handle entered the premises, threatened staff and demanded cash. Gardaí said a female member of staff was assaulted during the robbery. 
She received minor injuries. 
The raiders fled the scene, in the direction on Tinahely, County Wicklow, with a small amount of cash in a grey coloured Landrover Sport, partial registration 151 D. 
In a statement gardaí said this vehicle was being driven by a fourth man. It is believed that the raiders arrived at the post office in this vehicle and the driver remained in it outside the premises during the attack. 
A burnt out vehicle was later located at Clonegal, County Carlow. This vehicle has been seized by Gardaí for technical examination. 
Gardaí are appealing for witnesses and anyone with information is asked to contact them at Gorey Garda Station on 053 9430690, The Garda Confidential Line, 1800 666111 or any Garda station. Comments must be concise and to the point. The moderator will not enter into debate with individual contributors and the moderator’s decision is final. The comment facility is removed after 48 hours.
